trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of events for a control in the current container.
The AsyncPostBackTriggerEventNameConverter class derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.StringConverter> class.
It provides a list of event names for a control to display in a property editor in a design-time environment.
For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerEventNameConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a collection of event names for a control in the container in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> instance for a specified format context.
A format context object that can be used for more information about the environment that this converter is invoked from.
This parameter or its properties can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
A collection of strings that represent the event names of a control in the current container.
If no controls are currently contained, the method returns an empty collection.
If the context is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or if there is no current container, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

Returns a value that indicates whether the collection of standard values that is returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerEventNameConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values for the specified context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerEventNameConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a standard set of control event names that can be selected from a list.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.AsyncPostBackTriggerEventNameConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of control ID values that the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default implementation returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
